CustomField.formula: if(max(GC_Sold_2008__c,GC_Sold_2009__c, GC_Sold_2010__c,GC_Sold_2011__c)>0, image("http://chart.apis.google.com/chart?cht=bvs&chf=bg,s,ffffff&chco=236FBD&chd=t:" &text( GC_Sold_2008__c/max(GC_Sold_2008__c,GC_Sold_2009__c, GC_Sold_2010__c,GC_Sold_2011__c)*100 )&"," &text( GC_Sold_2009__c/max(GC_Sold_2008__c,GC_Sold_2009__c, GC_Sold_2010__c,GC_Sold_2011__c)*100 )&"," &text( GC_Sold_2010__c/max(GC_Sold_2008__c,GC_Sold_2009__c, GC_Sold_2010__c,GC_Sold_2011__c)*100 )&"," &text( GC_Sold_2011__c/max(GC_Sold_2008__c,GC_Sold_2009__c, GC_Sold_2010__c,GC_Sold_2011__c)*100 )&"&chs=200x80&chl=2008|2009|2010|2011","history"), image("http://chart.apis.google.com/chart?cht=bvs&chf=bg,s,ffffff&chco=236FBD&chd=t:0,0,0,0&chs=200x80&chl=2008|2009|2010|2011","history"))
CustomField.label: Sales history
